title: Spiced seasonal fruit salad
ingredients: ['1 large mango', '125 g (4½ oz) seedless black grapes, cut in half', '125 g (4½ oz) seedless green grapes, cut in half', '125 g (4½ oz) peaches, skinned, stoned and sliced', '125 g (4½ oz) strawberries, hulled and cut in half or into quarters, according to size', '25 g (1 oz) unsweetened desiccated coconut', '30 g (1¼ oz) caster sugar', 'A pinch of cayenne pepper', 'A pinch of mustard powder', 'Salt']
